channel.title: Matt Headley on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in Matt Headley on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: Passing It On
item.description: By no mere coincidence, Ruth finds herself gleaning in the field of Boaz, a kind and charitable relative of Naomi’s family.

item.title: The Right Kind of Anger
item.description: Paul wants us to put on the new clothes that God made for us.

item.title: Open Doors
item.description: The past few months have broght some encouraging developments on the ministry front in my work with YFC (Youth for Christ).

item.title: #storyofmylife
item.description: I’ve noticed a trend. After recently donning some new leadership and life roles, many good-natured folks have inquired about what I’ve done with my life lately (besides create the illusion of a perpetual chaotic furor).
